mapper.sql: id, school_name, enrollment_type, province_code, city_code, district, is_top, is_shalve, create_time, update_time, detail_address, school_web, school_fax, bus_road, user_id, collect_num, base_num, school_no
mapper.select: SELECT school_no from rise_school_info ORDER BY school_no desc LIMIT 0,1

select id as id, item_code AS itemCode, item_value AS itemName from sys_config_dict where dict_code = 'EDU_SCHOOL' and parent_item_id = (select id from sys_config_dict where item_code = #{registStatus}) and item_value like concat('%',#{schoolName},'%')
SELECT uf.nick_name as nickName,uf.mobile as mobile from users_front uf LEFT JOIN student s ON s.user_id = uf.id where (s.is_login_app = 1 or uf.regist_type = 4) and uf.mobile = #{mobile}
select count(id) from rise_school_info where school_name = #{schoolName}

SELECT rsi.id AS id, rsi.school_name AS school_name, rsi.enrollment_type AS enrollment_type, rsi.province_code AS province_code, rsi.city_code AS city_code, rsi.district AS district, rsi.is_top AS is_top, rsi.is_shalve AS is_shalve, rsi.create_time AS create_time, rsi.update_time AS update_time, rsi.detail_address AS detail_address, rsi.school_web AS school_web, rsi.school_fax AS school_fax, rsi.bus_road AS bus_road, rsi.user_id AS user_id, rsi.collect_num AS collect_num, rsi.base_num AS base_num, uss.userName AS userName, srsdo.item_name AS enrollmentName, srsdp.item_name AS provinceName, srsdq.item_name AS cityName, srsdr.item_name AS districtName, case when rsi.top_time is null then 0 else rsi.top_time end as top_time, rsi.isHidden FROM rise_school_info rsi INNER JOIN users uss ON uss.id = rsi.user_id INNER JOIN sys_rise_school_dict srsdo ON srsdo.item_code = rsi.enrollment_type INNER JOIN sys_rise_school_dict srsdp ON srsdp.item_code = rsi.province_code INNER JOIN sys_rise_school_dict srsdq ON srsdq.item_code = rsi.city_code INNER JOIN sys_rise_school_dict srsdr ON srsdr.item_code = rsi.district WHERE 1 = 1 AND rsi.school_name LIKE '%${schoolName}%' AND rsi.province_code = #{provinceCode} AND rsi.city_code = #{cityCode} AND rsi.district = #{district} AND rsi.is_shalve = #{isShalve} AND DATE_FORMAT(rsi.create_time,"%Y-%m-%d") >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startTime},"%Y-%m-%d") AND DATE_FORMAT(rsi.create_time,"%Y-%m-%d") = STR_TO_DATE(#{endTime},"%Y-%m-%d") AND DATE_FORMAT(rsi.create_time,"%Y-%m-%d") BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{startTime},"%Y-%m-%d") AND STR_TO_DATE(#{endTime},"%Y-%m-%d") AND rsi.is_top = #{isTop} AND rsi.enrollment_type = #{enrollmentType} ORDER BY rsi.is_top DESC,top_time desc ,rsi.update_time DESC limit #{firstIndex},#{pageSize}

SELECT rsi.id AS id, rsi.school_name AS school_name, rsi.enrollment_type AS enrollment_type, rsi.province_code AS province_code, rsi.city_code AS city_code, rsi.district AS district, rsi.is_top AS is_top, rsi.is_shalve AS is_shalve, rsi.create_time AS create_time, rsi.update_time AS update_time, rsi.detail_address AS detail_address, rsi.school_web AS school_web, rsi.school_fax AS school_fax, rsi.bus_road AS bus_road, rsi.user_id AS user_id, rsi.collect_num AS collect_num, rsi.base_num AS base_num FROM rise_school_info rsi WHERE rsi.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT rsi.id AS id, rsi.school_name AS school_name, rsi.enrollment_type AS enrollment_type, rsi.province_code AS province_code, rsi.city_code AS city_code, rsi.district AS district, rsi.is_top AS is_top, rsi.is_shalve AS is_shalve, rsi.create_time AS create_time, rsi.update_time AS update_time, rsi.detail_address AS detail_address, rsi.school_web AS school_web, rsi.school_fax AS school_fax, rsi.bus_road AS bus_road, rsi.user_id AS user_id, rsi.collect_num AS collect_num, rsi.base_num AS base_num FROM rise_school_info rsi WHERE rsi.id = #{schoolId}
SELECT id,item_code AS itemCode,item_name AS itemName,item_type AS itemType FROM sys_rise_school_dict where item_type='PROVINCE'
SELECT id,item_code AS itemCode,item_name AS itemName,item_type AS itemType ,parent_code as parentCode FROM sys_rise_school_dict where item_type='CITY'
SELECT id,item_code AS itemCode,item_name AS itemName,item_type AS itemType ,parent_code as parentCode FROM sys_rise_school_dict where item_type='DISTRICT'
